statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, address FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT name, email, address FROM customers ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC, age ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(sale_id) AS total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 2;
SELECT customer_name, sale_date FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id WHERE sale_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT customer_name, sale_amount FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT customers.customer_name, sales.sale_date FROM customers INNER JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id WHERE sales.sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_sales FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 500;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, order_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT sale_id, order_id, total_sales, sale_date FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, o.order_date, o.quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT s.sale_id, o.order_id, s.total_sales, s.sale_date FROM sales s JOIN orders o ON s.order_id = o.order_id WHERE s.sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id=1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 50 ORDER BY customer_id DESC, customer_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY category ASC, price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY order_date ASC, total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, subtotal FROM order_items JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY order_id ASC, subtotal DESC;
